main.name: Jay Carter
main.description: Passionate about data, analysis, business applications, visualization, technology, computers, volunteering and photography. Doing my best to make the world better one pixel at a time

resume.skillmessage: Skills: Electronic Medical Record Systems, Data Analysis of patient/medical/hospital data, Document Creation, Project management/team workflows, HIPAA and compliance confidentiality, Communication with 3rd party vendors, collaboration with collegues and teams, programming, computer/telececommunication - hardware/equipment, business software/applications/systems, certification for intermediate/advanced technical support and system analysis/administration

work.title: Information Technology Intern
work.description2: Assisted electronic medical record team with various projects to achieve department goals and objectives
work.description3: Used various legacy electronic medical record systems to analyze patient data in integration/merge workflows
work.description4: Attended EpicCare Ambulatory training in Verona, Wisconsin with the intention of certification
work.description5: Prepared team status reports for distribution to executive management
work.description6: Reviewed co-workers work quality to ensure it meets established standards
work.description7: Documented procedures to ensure consistent workflows
work.description8: Utilized excellent communication skills through multiple channels in a timely manner

work.title: Intern
work.description2: Cleaned imported data to be exported for patient information
work.description3: Prepared documentation, printed materials, and labeled letters/packages for marketing to current/potential patients
work.description4: Assisted co-workers with computer related issues and routinely fixed network and printer problems
work.description8: Utilized phones to communicate with patients and 3rd party vendors
